title: Regular season average attendance of the Milwaukee Brewers 2009 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2013.
gold: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the Milwaukee Brewers from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average regular season home attendance of the Milwaukee Brewers was 36,090 . • Milwaukee Brewers total home attendance • Major League Baseball average per game attendance • Major League Baseball total attendance
